title.rendered: JOB POST: Frontend Developer at (TCS) Tata Consultancy Services [On-Site, Full Time, 4+ years of Exp.]: Apply Now

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the post of Frontend Developer at (TCS) Tata Consultancy Services. Apply Now!

About TCS

Tata Consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses in their transformation journeys for over 56 years. Its consulting-led, cognitive powered, portfolio of business, technology and engineering services and solutions is delivered through its unique Location Independent Agile™ delivery model, recognized as a benchmark of excellence in software development.

A part of the Tata group, India’s largest multinational business group, TCS has over 601,000 of the world’s best-trained consultants in 55 countries. The company generated consolidated revenues of US $29 billion in the fiscal year ended March 31, 2024, and is listed on the BSE and the NSE in India. TCS’ proactive stance on climate change and award-winning work with communities across the world have earned it a place in leading sustainability indices such as the MSCI Global Sustainability Index and the FTSE4Good Emerging Index.

Required Skills

  • Strong proficiency in Angular (version 8 or later)
  • Reactive programming (RxJs)
  • Solid understanding of web technologies such as HTML5, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, Typescript, Bootstrap
  • Experience in writing Uni test case for Angular components
  • Experience with Npm package manager and Node Js
  • Good Experience in integration the Application with Rest Services/micro services
  • Good knowledge of CI/CD pipeline tools such as Jenkins, Lightspeed
  • Having good knowledge on Agile methodologies – SCRUM
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git, Bit Bucket,)
  • Good debugging skills for both Web and Hybrid Mobile Applications
  • Knowledge of software development methodologies and Agile practices
  • Good understanding of any Defect management tools like Quality centre, JIRA etc.,
  • Excellent communication skills, problem-solving and analytical skills

Other Requirements

  • Commute to this job’s location
  • Working in an onsite setting
  • 1+ years of work experience with Node.js

Experience

Experience Range: 5 to 8 years.

Date of Interview

March 22 2025.

How To Apply

Interested candidates can apply through this link.

Click here to view the official notification of Frontend Developer at (TCS) Tata Consultancy Services.
